title: Why suspended without any reason
body: My account has been suspended by Riot without any reason and I've done nothing wrong. This account only used by myself, i didn't use any third-part software, never afk, and check my match history in op.gg, I only play normal game in S8 (http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=miktony)

replies.body: people will never ever admit they script

Same I got suspended for no reason
I locked in the character
Then it said that I left the game

Assuming you didn't use any third party software/scripts etc it is likely that your account has been compromised and someone else has been using illicit programs with your account. Submit a ticket to player support and they will run you through account owner verification if there are signs of compromise.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
